definition: an expensive type of oolong tea
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: This is Mr. Tao Yuanqing piece entitled "Big Red" painting patterns.
sentences.chinese: 这是陶元庆先生的一幅题为《大红袍》的图案画。

sentences.english: The fragrance of State Guest Da Hung Pao tea is said to be so long-lasting.
sentences.chinese: 国宾大红袍的茶香据说是非常持久。

definition: Tieguanyin tea (a variety of oolong tea)
variant of 單叢|单丛[Dan1 cong1]
biluochun or pi lo chun, a type of green tea grown in the Dongting Mountain region near Lake Tai 太湖[Tai4 Hu2], Jiangsu
Gong Cha, international franchise selling Taiwan-style milk tea and smoothies etc, established in Kaohsiung in 2006
Longjing county level city in Yanbian Korean autonomous prefecture 延邊朝鮮族自治州|延边朝鲜族自治州, Jilin/Lungching township in Taichung county 臺中縣|台中县[Tai2 zhong1 xian4], Taiwan/also Longjing tea 龍井茶|龙井茶
Pu'er tea from the Pu'er region of Yunnan
dark tea, a variety of fermented tea (e.g. Pu'er tea 普洱茶[Pu3 er3 cha2])
